title: Looking for a Diamond Coach for Mid lane =D
body: Hey so i recently got into gold Playing Cassiopeia  and i smashed out Gold 5,4,3 and then as soon as i got to Gold 2 i seemed to be getting out skilled, now i know some of you going to think that gold is easy... well this is my first time in the division and i am looking for a mid lane pro that is very experienced and high Elo to teach me there way's and that could give me a few tip'& trick's. Also is the help is really good i can even give you a 30$ tip for willing to help me you out if i am trying to achieve Plat! =D thank's for reading if you got this far. Please no hate

replies.body: I don't main mid, nor am I high Elo but I can give you some advice if you'd like. I notice things that mid laners do wrong a lot of the time.
Hey man any help would be good i added you IGN on League =D
